title: Miami Spy Games: Russian Zombie Gun, Episode Five
description: Zombie attacks have been reported all over the city of Miami. Jennifer, Mike and Kostas continue to pursue the Russian Zombie Gun, and now they have help.Mikeâ€™s mentor Dale Comstock has arrived. Mike has a history with this man, one that not even the other ACES members know about. Will they put their differences aside to combat the zombie threat?The Miami ACES team is back in the fifth installment of Miami Spy Games.Publisher Note: You can now purchase all 12 episodes together in one book!
author: Armand Rosamilia
